metadata.name: AKBAR Chicken
metadata.description:
Handmade Ceramic Sculpture-Underglaze painting
2021            
12*12*14 cm 
Background painting by Hanjooz

AKBAR JOJE( chicken) is the result of a romantic night between a famous Akbar and a hot chicken.
AKBAR JOJE is the name of a famous restaurant in Iran with a very special chicken recipe.
